external_games.name: Ouchi de Rilakkuma: Rilakkuma ga Ouchi ni Yatte Kita

name: Ouchi de Rilakkuma: Rilakkuma ga Ouchi ni Yatte Kita
storyline:
Rilakkuma, Korilakkuma, and Kiiroitori live in your house before you know it. They roam, play with toys, and live freely.

In this game, you can take care of them, give them snacks, play games, and sweat together in fitness.

Why don't you relax at home and rest your mind with Rilakkuma?
summary:
Easy Living with Rilakkuma

Before you know it, Rilakkuma, Korilakkuma, and Kiiroitori are living in your house. They laze around, play with toys, and do as they please. They may even make a mess, scribble on the wall, and get into trouble from time to time. While not exactly helpful in any way, they somehow have a mysterious charm that cannot help but put a smile on your face.
